DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate cost time effective intervention previous RCT preterm infant parent reduce parent experience concern stress , improve childrens development various aspect three year correct age . Hypothesis 1 : The preterm born child parent enrol earlier RCT high developmental level preterm child parent receive usual treatment . Hypothesis 2 : Parents enrol earlier RCT low level stress concern parent receive treatment usual .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Effect The Mother Infant Transaction Program ( MITP )
DOC.detailed_description: A previous RCT Ravn ( NCT00245843 ) investigate MITP could sensitize mother toward baby signal thereby increase quality joint attention . The study follow child 1 year . This study follow-up mention RCT . It investigate whether effect RCT present three year correct age . The research question : 1 . Can psychoeducative program like MITP influence childrens ` development various aspect ? 2 . How MITP influence parent experience concern stress three year later ? 3 . Were difference group ? ) Preterm intervention group b ) Preterm control group c ) Full term control group The questionnaire use observational study : Ages Stages
DOC.criteria: All parent child participate Ravn 's RCT say yes ask participation eventually later study ask .
